title: Not connecting
body: Im in the middle of a game right now, trying to recconect, i use wifi nd im in a skype call, i keep dcing and yet im making this post and skyping, any help?

replies.body: It sounds like your connection is having problems specifically reaching the gaming servers, even if your internet might work fine making other connections.  You should run through the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to fix this up.  Let me know if you have any questions!

im not sure what the exact problem is, i recconect for like, a second, then dc again
or i recconect and im lvl 1?
